data.meta_description: A once in a lifetime Podcast from two men who have seen and done it all. They engage in thought-provoking conversations, exploring topics like personal growth, Â resilience, transformation and the power of choice. All of this is wrapped around street stories that will make you laugh, cry, and scaredâ¦
data.text:
Join Chazz Palminteri and Michael Franzese as they delve into the captivating story behind the making of "The Passion of the Christ" and its profound impact on the actors and crew. From Mel Gibson's courageous decision to self-fund the film to Jim Caviezel's transformative experience portraying Jesus, this episode explores the challenges, miracles, and controversies surrounding the highest-grossing faith-based film of all time. Don't miss out on this enlightening conversation between two wise voices from the world of entertainment and beyond. Subscribe now and join us on The Wise and The Wiseguy Podcast!

#PassionoftheChrist #BehindtheScenes#FaithJourney #MelGibson #JimCaviezel #WiseWiseguyPodcast

In this episode of 'The Wise and The Wiseguy' podcast with Chazz Palminteri & Michael Franzese, they tackle the pressing issue of social media's impact on our youth. From discussing age limits on social media platforms to exploring the dangers of cyberbullying and the rise of misinformation, Chazz and Michael offer candid insights into the double-edged sword of social media. Join them as they navigate the complexities of modern communication and ponder the question: Should we ban social media altogether? Don't miss out on this must-listen episode!"

#TheWiseandTheWiseGuy #ChazzPalminteri#MichaelFranzese #SocialMedia #DigitalEra

Join Chazz Palminteri and Michael Franzese on 'The Wise and The Wiseguy' podcast as they delve into the consequencesâor lack thereofâin today's society. From discussing the implications of a world without repercussions to the alarming rise of crime with minimal accountability, no stone is left unturned. Reflecting on their own experiences, Michael's insights from his time as a former criminal shed light on the harsh reality of a justice system that sometimes falls short.Â

Â

Tune in for thought-provoking conversations and unfiltered perspectives!Â

Â

#TheWiseandTheWiseguy #ChazzPalminteri #MichaelFranzese

Â Diving deep into the gritty streets and silver screens, join Chazz Palminteri and Michael Franzese on 'The Wise and The Wiseguy' podcast. Unveiling the secrets behind Hollywood's portrayal of the mafia, the duo explores the romanticized allure and the real-life impact of iconic movies like The Godfather. From humanizing characters to the evolution of mob fashion, they dissect the threads woven into our culture by these cinematic masterpieces.Â

Â

Â Don't miss the gripping tales and insightful discussions on the intersection of reality and fiction in the mob world.

Â

Subscribe now for your weekly dose of wisdom and wiseguy stories!Â

Â

#thewiseandthewiseguy #MafiaMovies #HollywoodSecrets

Dive into a riveting conversation on the latest episode of "The Wise and The Wiseguy" podcast with Chazz Palminteri and Michael Franzese.Â Â They tackle pressing issues in America, from rising crime to political polarization.Â

Get ready for personal anecdotes, including Michael's encounter with the police during a protest. Â Plus, they share thoughts on immigration, media influence, and the unique qualities that make the U.S. special. Don't miss the candid insights and compelling discussions. Â Tune in now!

#WiseWiseguy #PodcastTalks #CurrentIssues

Â Join Chazz Palminteri, The Wise, and Michael Franzese, The Wiseguy, as they dive deep into the pressing social issues of our time. In this candid conversation, they reflect on the current state of the world, sharing insights on the challenges and changes that have left them questioning the norms.

From politics to law enforcement, they tackle tough topics with honesty and a touch of humor. Â Don't miss the latest episode of 'The Wise and The Wiseguy' where no topic is off-limits and every perspective is explored.

Â Subscribe now for thought-provoking discussions and unfiltered commentary. #WiseAndWiseguy #SocialIssues #CurrentEvents #ChazzPalminteri #MichaelFranzese
